p.b: Date and Time of Death example

body.codeblock: <entry> <!-- Time of Death Observation --> <observation classCode="OBS" moodCode="EVN"> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.26.1.13"/> <code code="31211-6" codeSystem="2.16.840.1.113883.6.1" codeSystemName="LOINC" displayName="Date of Death"/> <text>Optional information relevant to the date/time of death in cases where the point in time can in no way be established.</text> <effectiveTime> <low value="20121201100000"/> <high value="20121201100000"/> </effectiveTime> </observation> </entry>
